mapper.select: SELECT A.seq, A.title, A.content, CASE WHEN EXISTS ( SELECT 1 FROM B_POST_LIKE B WHERE B.post_no = A.seq AND B.user_no = #{user_no} ) THEN 'Y' ELSE 'N' END AS like_yn, ( SELECT COUNT(*) FROM B_POST_LIKE B WHERE B.post_no = A.seq ) AS like_num, DATE_FORMAT(A.created_at, '%Y/%m/%d %H:%i:%s') AS created_at, DATE_FORMAT(A.last_modified_at, '%Y/%m/%d %H:%i:%s') AS last_modified_at FROM B_POST A WHERE A.user_no = #{userId} and A.state = 'Y' ORDER BY A.created_at DESC;
